ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Like sheltered eggs in a nest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: so delicate as the hidden peel under an egg's shell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who are as chaste as sheltered eggs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: As if they were eggs, safely hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: as if they were Bayd Maknun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: As if they were eggs carefully protected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: as if they were hidden pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Pure) as they were hidden eggs (of the ostrich).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: As though they were eggs hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: as if they were hidden ostrich eggs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: As if they were (delicate) eggs closely guarded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Delicate and pure) as if they were (hidden) eggs (well) preserved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: as if they were hidden pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As if they were closely guarded pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:49] as if they were, in terms of [the starkness of their white] colour, hidden eggs, of ostriches, sheltered by their feathers from dust, the colour being that whiteness with a hint of pallor, which is the most beautiful of female complexions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (As they were hidden eggs) in their purity, in both heat and cold.
